original_text: Then the Israelites asked, “Who from all the tribes of Israel has failed to assemble before the Lord?” For they had taken a solemn oath that anyone who failed to assemble before the Lord at Mizpah was to be put to death.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 이르되 이스라엘 온 지파 중에 총회와 함께 하여 여호와 앞에 올라오지 아니한 자가 누구냐 하니 이는 그들이 크게 맹세하기를 미스바에 와서 여호와 앞에 이르지 아니하는 자는 반드시 죽일 것이라 하였음이라

sentences.original_text: Who from all the tribes of Israel
has failed to assemble before the Lord?
For they had taken a solemn oath
that anyone who failed to assemble
was to be put to death.
